backgroundImage() - Method in class org.TheGivingChild.Screens.ScreenAdapterManager
Draws the ScreenAdapterManager.backgroundRegion to the screen, allowing for resizing.
backgroundRegion - Variable in class org.TheGivingChild.Screens.ScreenAdapterManager
The texture region that takes ScreenAdapterManager.backgroundTexture and allows it to be stretched when batch.drawn

TGC_Engine.backgroundSounds is an Array of Music to play in the background.

The initial Texture to be applied to ScreenAdapterManager.backgroundRegion
